start: ^Good morning. Ready to go to school today?
^I don't want to go to school today.
step2: ^Feeling stressed? Oh, looks like your stressnometer is somewhat high.
^Your stress levels seem a bit high, but still manageable.
^Is there a way to reduce my stress?
ending: ^Well, I'm watching an interview about that on television right now.
^In short, you can't escape stress because there will always be things that will stress you. What's important is that you learn how to manage it.
^I think they will talk about healthy ways to cope with stress, but you should get to school now before you are late.
^Maybe you can ask your teacher about how to manage stress.
^When you leave the house, just keep walking right. You should get there on time.
